reviews.review: very good game but very russian
Game requires huge amount of tactics and teamwork to play!!  Always play in a team of 3 minimally to avoid getting toxic players. Otherwise its a good game.
It¬¥s still exiting as it was at the beginning, more security against cheaters it would make more fun for sure and some better skin drop rate too.

This game is one of the best games in the world. Is fun to play it with friends and solo. I personally learned to speak russian from playing this game since there are many players from that country. Something i don't like is that i originally payed to get this game and now is free and everything i received in exchange is a badge...
Amazing game - played since source. Guaranteed to ruin your life :thumbs up:

Valve Anti-Cheat (VAC) is an anti-cheat software product developed by Valve as a component of the Steam platform, first released with Counter-Strike in 2002. When the software detects a cheat on a player's system, it will ban them in the future, possibly days or weeks after the original detection.
